short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Exclusively for Akubo IT users. Automatically fill credentials based on saved passwords, providing a streamlined login experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Akubo IT Autofill, the ideal complement to the Akubo IT password management.

📌Important Note: This Autofill is designed exclusively for users of Akubo IT. To fully utilize the features of this extension, you must have an active Akubo IT account. This extension enhances your experience by providing seamless autofill capabilities on supported websites. 

**Key Features:** 🌟

✅ Unified Password Management: Seamlessly integrate your Akubo IT account with our extension for effortless login management.
✅ Automated Autofill: Let us do the heavy lifting. Our extension automatically detects and fills in your login details on saved websites, eliminating the need for manual entry.
✅ Multi-Account Support: Have multiple accounts for a website? No problem. We offer a selection so you can choose the right credentials with ease.
✅ Robust Security: Rest assured knowing your data is encrypted and protected, adhering to the highest security standards.
✅ User-Friendly Interface: Our user-friendly design ensures a seamless browsing experience.


Usage ❔
Simply download the extension and use an existing Akubo IT Account. The autofill feature will automatically be enabled.

Experiencing difficulties? 🐞
💬 Contact the dev team
📬 Report the bug through the feedback section

What's New 🆕
